analysis.description:
Nihilum.payNihilum has external calls inside a loop:
	- shareholders[i].transfer(nihilumBalanceOf(shareholders[i])) (/unique_chucks/21/0x5f9df71056d7c7530ae75d773bac98cfa887dbd4.sol#328-329)

	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"
